column5: News item: The Biden Administration is going to restrict travel from India starting next week. But last year candidate Biden said this:  Meanwhile who needs slow-motion replay when you have stellar moments like this in real time:  Commenters who employ what we deem extreme vulgarity in a comment — “s***” “f***” “a*******” or one of their many variants — will be banned without further notice.  “Arise and take our stand for freedom as in the olden time.”

column1: Winston Churchill “Proclaim Liberty throughout All the land unto All the Inhabitants Thereof.”
